text: Nesoluma is a genus of flowering plants in the family Sapotaceae. Species include: * Nesoluma nadeaudii (Drake) Pierre ex H.J.Lam (French Polynesia) * Nesoluma polynesicum (Hillebr.) Baill. \- Keahi (Cook Tubuai, and Hawaiian Islands) * Nesoluma st.-johnianum H.J.Lam & B.Meeuse (Pitcairn Islands) ==References== Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Sapotaceae genera
title: Nesoluma
